a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Artificial intelligence: Performance on knowledge tests vs. dataset
Performance on knowledge tests is measured with the MMLU benchmark, here with 5-shot learning, which gauges a
modelâ€™s accuracy after receiving only five examples for each task. Training dataset size refers to the volume of text that is
employed to train a model effectively.
Note: The values for dataset size are estimates and come with some uncertainty, especially for models for which only minimal information
has been disclosed, such as GPT-4.
